Name: Christopher Cameron
Details: Birth date unknown. Christopher Cameron is the first Director-General of the reborn Terran Hegemony and the First Lord of the Second Star League, the throne of which he took in 3058 when that governing body was created. He served as Director-General from 3036 until 3061, when he stepped down shortly before the 2nd Whitting Conference in favor of his eldest son, Ian Cameron III. Christopher Cameron proved a visionary, leading the Hegemony to reclaim its place as one of the Great Houses of the Inner Sphere and serving as the impetus for the founding of the Second Star League in order to put an end to the Clan threat via Operation BULLDOG and Task Force SERPENT.
